title: Guitar
medium: Spruce, ebony, fruitwood, bone, ivory, mother-of-pearl, parchment
dimensions:
Height: 35 11/16 in. (90.7 cm)
Width (at greatest point): 9 1/2 in. (24.1 cm)
Depth (rib height at bottom): 3 11/16 in. (9.4 cm)
creditLine: Purchase, Rogers Fund, Mrs. Peter Nicholas, University of Chicago Club of New York, Mrs. Henry J. Heinz II and Lowell S. Smith and Sally Sanford Gifts, The Crosby Brown Collection of Musical Instruments, by exchange, and funds from various donors, 1984
